meanings.sent1: My phone is upgradeable, so I can make it better with new features.
meanings.sent2: The software is upgradeable, allowing for easy enhancements.
meanings.sent3: The upgradeable computer felt proud when it received the latest updates.
meanings.sent4: Her upgradeable skills shone brightly after the training session.
meanings.sent5: The upgradeable car transformed into a futuristic vehicle with the new technology.

meanings.definition: Able to be improved or enhanced.
meanings.sent1: His upgradeable performance at work impressed his boss.
meanings.sent2: The upgradeable design of the house allowed for future modifications.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so upgradeable that it seemed to get tastier with each bite.
meanings.sent4: Her upgradeable creativity knew no bounds when she started painting.
meanings.sent5: The upgradeable garden bloomed beautifully after the extra care.

meanings.sent1: The upgradeable device easily accepted the new software.
meanings.sent2: The upgradeable platform was perfect for the upcoming changes.
meanings.sent3: The upgradeable room seemed to smile when the new furniture arrived.
meanings.sent4: His upgradeable mindset welcomed fresh ideas with open arms.
meanings.sent5: The upgradeable building embraced the modern updates with grace.
